title: When Kids Choose the Wrong Path
itunes:author: Guest: Jim Burns
itunes:summary: People often expect ministry kids to be perfect, but John and Danny discuss the fact that parents can do everything right, and yet sometimes their kids may still go down the wrong path. Receive the book Understanding Your Teen with your gift of any amount!
description: People often expect ministry kids to be perfect, but John and Danny discuss the fact that parents can do everything right, and yet sometimes their kids may still go down the wrong path. Receive the book Understanding Your Teen with your gift of any amount!
